backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining ServiceType and BookingStatus enums with comparison functions, Booking data structures, and CRUD operations for managing service bookings with in-memory Map storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping five implemented features (booking system, form, list with filters, status updates, and visual theme) to their corresponding files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing routing, pages, components, hooks, and styling for the service booking application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with custom CSS variables defining OKLCH color system for light and dark modes, including sidebar, chart, and theme-specific color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, page title 'Service Hub', and script tag loading the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining root layout route and three child routes (home, booking, management) with type-safe router setup and provider.
frontend/src/components/BookingFilters.t: Filter component with two Select dropdowns for filtering bookings by service type (lawn mowing/car wash) and status (pending/confirmed/completed).
frontend/src/components/BookingForm.tsx: Comprehensive booking form with customer details, service type selection with icons, date picker, address input, validation, and backend integration with success toast and navigation.
frontend/src/components/BookingsList.tsx: Displays a table of bookings with filtering support, showing service type, date, address, and status with icons and badges. Includes loading, error, and empty states, and integrates BookingStatusUpdate for status changes.
frontend/src/components/BookingStatusUpd: Dropdown menu component for updating booking status with loading state, current status indicator, and toast notifications on success or error.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Renders a hero banner with gradient background and hero image, supporting both full-height and compact modes for different page layouts.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Provides the main application layout with a sticky header containing navigation links, mobile menu toggle, and footer. Uses TanStack Router for navigation and active link highlighting.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Displays a service card component with icon, title, and description, styled differently for lawn mowing vs car wash services with hover effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality using DFINITY's AuthClient, managing identity state and delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching bookings with filters, creating new bookings, and updating booking status, all using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for theming including light/dark mode colors, custom service colors (lawn/wash), and chart colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component into the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPage.tsx: Page component for creating new bookings, displaying a compact hero section and the BookingForm component with instructional text.
frontend/src/pages/BookingsManagementPag: Page component for managing bookings with filter controls for service type and status, displaying filtered results in BookingsList.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page component that displays a hero section, service cards for lawn mowing and car washing, a 'How It Works' section with three steps, and a call-to-action button to book services.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom color schemes (including lawn/wash service colors using OKLCH), container settings, border radius variables, animations, and typography/container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking completed features (booking system, filtering, status updates, UI theme) and pending backend data model implementation, along with image requirements for service icons and hero banner.
